name: ChaBug
description:
This game is my entry for the Woowie Jam 2.0! on the theme "Intentional bugs".

In this game, you play a little mage in a seemingly classic platformer who will need to explore the very structure of the game itself to correct the bugs that will get in his way !

The game is entirely made in Visual Basic.NET with no premade engine. For Windows only.
